definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: This technique suits to schlieren system which schlieren mirrors arespherical especially.
sentences.chinese: 此技术特别适用于纹影镜为球面反射镜的纹影系统。

sentences.english: A curved margin of a highway was reflectorized for safety.
sentences.chinese: 为安全起见公路的弯道边上装设了反射镜。

sentences.english: SiC is a good substrate material for laser mirrors with higher therma…
sentences.chinese: 碳化硅是较优秀的反射镜材料。

sentences.english: Separate the reflector from the rear bumper .
The United States imports focusing mirrors and metal mirrors, cutting and strong.
sentences.chinese: 采用美国进口聚焦镜和金属反射镜，切割力强。

sentences.english: An all fiber wavelength tunable loop mirror is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种全光纤波长可调谐环路反射镜。

sentences.english: The three mirrors are directly mounted on the Silicon Carbide plates using titanium bolts.
sentences.chinese: 三块反射镜使用钛制螺栓直接安装在碳化硅的端板上。

sentences.english: The fabrication process and application of silicon carbide mirror are presented.
sentences.chinese: 综述了碳化硅反射镜材料常用制备方法的特点。

sentences.english: Micro-mirror is a fundamental part of micro optics adaptive system.
sentences.chinese: 微反射镜是微光学自适应系统中的基本组成部分。

sentences.english: Experimental results show that the system is feasible for changing the surface profiles of a membrane mirror.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果表明，该系统可有效改变薄膜反射镜的面形。

sentences.english: Research of the surface modification for two kinds of silicon carbide mirror in common use.
sentences.chinese: 两种常用碳化硅反射镜基底表面改性的研究。

sentences.english: The parabolic reflector of a searchlight gives a parallel beam.
sentences.chinese: 探照灯的抛物面反射镜发出平行光束。

sentences.english: An omnidirectional reflector based on 1D photonic crystal of heterostructures is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 研究了异质结构一维光子晶体全向反射镜的设计方法。

sentences.english: By rotating the two mirrors, we can tune the dye-laser wavelengths.
sentences.chinese: 转动两个全反射镜能同时调谐两个激光输出波长。

sentences.english: Thus thin mirror ( very thick mirror ) can only be used in Dobsonian design.
sentences.chinese: 因此薄身的反射镜只可以用于多布森装置。

sentences.english: One end is a plane mirror, the other is a metal mesh.
sentences.chinese: 谐振腔一端为平面反射镜，一端为金属栅网。
